column4: hello is it possible to run dreamweavercs3 and photoshopcs3 in ubuntu 7.04? - windows users here trying to migrate ubuntu.
im not sure about "wine" thing
it dosen't work in wine
is there a way that dreamweavercs3 and photoshop cs3 could run in ubuntu?
yes there is, you could install windows inside ubuntu and run it from there
and still i will buy windows licenses??
yes that's :(
i know photoshop cs 2 works under wine
install wine in windows xp?
for more information on what you can run using wine, check this page http://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=version&iId=2631
no you don't have to install xp if you use wine, wine is something that can help you run windows stuff on linux without having to install windows itself
gimp is available for windows too if you want to check it out
i think you're stuck if you have to use those, atleast for now :/
if you don't pay the license it's illegal
for webdevelopment i recomend aptana, or programming in general eclipse
aptana and general eclipse is for ubuntu?
yes
check out http://www.eclipse.org/ and http://www.aptana.com/ . aptana has a free version and a pro version
ok thanks for the advices.guys thanks..my copany's licensed OS are now 38 genuine xp home.and corporate cs3 and MS visual basic IIS..we are trying to migrate to unix (ubuntu)
ok :) good that you are looking for alternatives. wish you luck =)

i don't know on proffesional level. as i'm just a hobby user
